message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item's value, but I'm only able to offer $100 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $130. This is already a significant reduction from my initial offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the item, I would like to counter with an offer of $120. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
